description.p: Defines rules computed on the client (browser/mobile device) to dynamically style fields in the List control.

discussion.p: Client-side conditional styles can be defined using the *[ui:Conditional style]* property. These styles are computed at run-time on the client.
The *[ui:Conditional style]* is applied to the field.
If you want to define a conditional style for the element that contains the field, use the [Conditional cell style] property.
